---
category: news
title: "Using deep learning to predict the vision of glaucoma patients"
excerpt: "Research from a team including the Crabb Lab at City, University of London has used \"deep learning\" (DL), which is a type of artificial intelligence (AI), on thousands of images of the backs of the eyes of glaucoma patients to predict how much their vision has been affected by the disease."
